We’d love to see you at a local strategy meeting on Smart Justice!

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

We haven’t stopped! We’re focused on making sure that people all across Kansas know how important district attorneys are. In addition to meeting with district attorneys this month, we’re hosting strategy meetings where we’ll come together to think of real solutions to reduce mass incarceration.

We need you! We want people who are directly impacted by mass incarceration to be at the table. Your voice matters. Tell your family, friends, and colleagues to join us as we aim to make our state freer.

Douglas County Smart Justice
Strategy Meeting

We’re continuing our work to hold the Douglas County prosecutor accountable.

Thursday, May 16, 6:30 p.m.
Lawrence Public Library
707 Vermont St.
Lawrence, KS 66044

RSVP TODAY

Our Douglas County Smart Justice Strategy Team is meeting on Thursday, May 16 at 6:30 p.m. RSVP today to learn about our efforts to fight Kansas’ mass incarceration problem.

We’re in this fight together, and I cannot wait to see you.

Kiana Knolland
Smart Justice Field Director, ACLU of Kansas
